snippet: While ailing from a terminal illness, Ed Pincus, who died this week, teamed up with Lucia Small, a past collaborator, for one last joint documentary.
abstract: Documentary One Cut, One Life, final collaborative effort of Ed Pincus and Lucia Small, attempts to process several losses in both filmmaker's lives, including Pincus's diagnosis with terminal disease; Pincus died on November 5.
lead_paragraph: While ailing from a terminal illness, Ed Pincus, who died this week, teamed up with Lucia Small, a past collaborator, for one last joint documentary.

headline.seo: For Ed Pincus, One Last Film With Lucia Small
headline.main: Grasping at Life, Petals, Pain and All
headline.print_headline: Grasping at Life, Petals, Pain and All
